title: "Hard Like Funk" design by Precursor, font by who?
content:
Anyone know this one?

comments.content:
It looks a lot like something Identikal designed a while back. Have a look on their website, you may find it here.

[http://www.identikalshop.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070320133438/http:/www.identikalshop.com/)
